column1: Transcribed from the Microwriter New User Guide found at https://www.microsoft.com/buxtoncollection/a/pdf/Microwriter%20New%20Users%20Guide.pdf

column3: Key in third mode (not standard MW chords)

column14: exclamation (not same as standard Microwriter code, allows £ and # to have sensible chords)
shift capitalises next character. Pressing twice turns on caps lock. Pressing again turns off.
fourth mode - to access ASCII Control Characters
press once to enter numbers/punctuation mode, twice to lock into that mode. Pressing again turns off.
delete / delete mode (not standard Microwriter chord)
third mode - to access other printable ASCII characters
